Name: Blood Island
About the game: The navigator Navi'Tan from the southern lands finds a mysterious fragment of a crystal resembling a ruby. He decides to solve the riddle and collect all the parts of the artifact together, especially since the stone began to control the mind of the young sailor. What will this adventure lead to and what will happen when the artifact is assembled? FPS adventure WASD - control. Space - attack
